posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728293031323334353637383940414243public class Reflection_Script : MonoBehaviour{ void Start() { //每一个类对应一个Type对象,存储了当前类中有哪些成员 MyClass my = new MyClass(); //Type本身是一个抽象类，不能被实例化 Type t = my.GetType(); //Debug.Log(t.Name);//获取类名 //Debug.Log(t.Namespace);//获取命名空间 //Debug.Log(t.Assembly);//获取程序集 //只能获取到 public 修饰的字段 FieldInfo[] f_Array = t.GetFields(); //foreach (var item in f_Array) //{ // Debug.Log(item.Name); //} //获取 public 修饰的属性 PropertyInfo[] p_Array = t.GetProperties(); //foreach (var item in p_Array) //{ // Debug.Log(item.Name); //} //获取 public 修饰的方法 MethodInfo[] m_Array = t.GetMethods(); //foreach (var item in m_Array) //{ // Debug.Log(item.Name); //} //通过类的Type对象 获取到类所在的程序集 Assembly assem = my.GetType().Assembly; Debug.Log(assem.FullName); }} More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
